rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF2661} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MGF3361%, MGM3361, MGX3361}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}

description: The interface between establishing a continuous learning environment, coaching and performance appraisal systems, training and development practices and the implementation of reward systems. The unit focus is on: personal and organisational skills and procedures through setting performance standards and objectives; performance review methods; giving effective feedback; links with rewards and compensation; determining training and development needs and objectives; coaching and feedback skills, planning, conducting and evaluating the training and development of staff.
